name: Car Crash Armageddon (LITE)
description:
Welcome to the Car Crash Armageddon multiplayer arena!
This is the free edition of this new car-crash game with crazy rules
where you can challenge yours friends (and enemies) in furious matches online.

The LITE edition contains:

- 2 arenas;

- 4 differents cars;

- 4 types of  power-up: -pizzas & pastiera cakes make you heavier and stronger but also slower (choose your strategy) ; sand glasses give you extra time and  dynamites trigger explosions 15 seconds after contact;

- multiplayer mode for 4 players;

- for now a limited capacity online server: 20 players online;

- particular care in optimizing for old hardware.

This already allows you to have a lot of fun.
I hope you enjoy it, like I do, so that in the future I could work much more on this project and make a full-content-edition.
